classroom.name: h2

hero.title: Project Paramour
hero.description: Project made for an art museum near Southwest London. Project Paramour is a statement of bold, modern architecture.

hero.title: Seraph Station
hero.description: The Seraph Station project challenged us to design a unique station that would transport people through time. The result is a fresh and futuristic model inspired by space stations.

hero.title: Federal II Tower
hero.description: A sequel theme project for a tower originally built in the 1800s. We achieved this with a striking look of brutal minimalism with modern touches.

hero.title: Trinity Bank Tower
hero.description: Trinity Bank challenged us to make a concept for a 84 story building located in the middle of a city with a high earthquake frequency. For this project we used curves to blend design and stability to meet our objectives.

welcome.title: Welcome to Arch Studio
welcome.description:
We have a unique network and skillset to help bring your projects to life. Our small team of highly skilled individuals combined with our large network put us in a strong position to deliver exceptional results.

Over the past 10 years, we have worked on all kinds of projects. From stations to high-rise buildings, we create spaces that inspire and delight.

We work closely with our clients so that we understand the intricacies of each project. This allows us to work in harmony the surrounding area to create truly stunning projects that will stand the test of time.

hero.title: Your team of professionals
hero.description: Our small team of world-class professionals will work with you every step of the way. Strong relationships are at the core of everything we do. This extends to the relationship our projects have with their surroundings.
